poem:
### The Cost of Progress

In the crosshairs of innovation,  
voices whisper through silenced lands;  
beneath the gleam of profit men  
with cold brilliance extinguish  
flickering hopes. In corridors of power,  
dreams collapse, echoes of lives  
unwritten, while hands once  
stretched across the sea retract,  
turning inwards to grasp shadows  
and the solitude of empty gold.
